tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a consultation with Dr. Amita for my test reports of a comprehensive health checkup. Dr. Amita identified the right issues, asked relevant questions about the symptoms and prescribed treatment and follow-ups. She also reassured not to worry about certain parameters with explanation. She answered all my questions patiently and in a friendly and approachable manner. I am happy with my consultation with Dr. Amita.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Amita was very kind to me on the online consultation. My entire family was down with covid and I had consulted her for my daughter specifically. She patiently replied  to all my queries. She assured that things would become better and that faith helped us sail through the situation. Thank you doctor

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Had a good experience with doctor. she suggested antiviral for my prolonged fever and all the tests. The medicines worked best and I started feeling quickly. would definitely recommend her. Also, she explained and listen to the problem really patiently and well

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a discussion regarding my health checkup report. The doctor was quick to diagnose the basic issue and gave me clear consultation on what is to be treated and how to change my lifestyle. She suggested few tests and was also quick to give consultation post the submission on new test. I strongly recommend Dr. Amita. Thanks for your help.

tags: Wait time,
review: I did not have a very good experience with Dr. Amrita Mody. I had got a full body check done and had consulted her to check my report and give me feedback about the same. I shared 2 reports with her and she referred to only one. I kept telling her that she has not given me any feedback about thyroid and my Vitamin deficiency so she asked me to share the report again and even before I could share the report the marked the session as completed and since the session is marked as completed I cannot call her and the only way of communication is the chat window. Now it's been 3-4 hours and I am just waiting for her to response and still my queries are unanswered. I felt that the online patients are not being treated with equal importantance and urgency.

tags: None
review: It was our first interaction through Practo. We are so thankful to Dr Amita Mody she was good and helped us understand the ailment better. The online consultation saved us the hassle of going to the clinic. It not only saved time but also made economic sense. Thank you Practo and Dr Amita.

tags: None
review: Me, My father and my wife all tested positive for covid and got treated by Dr. Amita. I was having high grade fever which lasted for 7 days. Dr.Amita continuous monitoring and medication with proper guidance saved my life and even I didn't require to visit hospital. Thank you so much Mam!
reply_text: Thank you very much for the feedback üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I would not like to recommend Dr Amita due to her irresponsive behaviour. She recommended some blood tests and on the same day at 4:30 pm approx I shared the reports with her. She didn't even respond until 9pm and my wife was without any medications *** *** ********* *** ******* ****** Therefore i had to contact another doctor for a consultation.
reply_text: This is no emergency plateform. Its perfectly fine to respond to blood reports by end of the day. We are not online 24*7.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: We , both husband  and wife, of around 70 years each, had severe loose motions on April 9. We contacted Dr Amita Mody through Practo. Considering our age and conditions,  we had lot of nervousness. Dr Amita talked to us and responded  for our all queries.  This made us very comfortable.  We would be happy to contact her again for future  need.
